mutants.code:
from collections import Counter

def find_unique_numbers(arr, desc=True):
    frequency = Counter(arr)
    unique_elements = [key for (key, value) in frequency.items() if value == 1]
    unique_elements.sort(reverse=desc)
    return unique_elements

mutants.original_line: unique_elements = [key for key, value in frequency.items() if value == 1]
mutants.mutated_line: unique_elements = [key for (key, value) in frequency.items() if value != 1]
mutants.code:
from collections import Counter

def find_unique_numbers(arr, desc=False):
    frequency = Counter(arr)
    unique_elements = [key for (key, value) in frequency.items() if value != 1]
    unique_elements.sort(reverse=desc)
    return unique_elements

mutants.code:
from collections import Counter

def find_unique_numbers(arr, desc=False):
    frequency = Counter(arr)
    unique_elements = [key for (key, value) in frequency.items() if value == -1]
    unique_elements.sort(reverse=desc)
    return unique_elements
